TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PeerResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定用來定義合約的基底型別，以便將對等網狀結構 ID 註冊並解析至參與網狀結構之節點的端點位址。

span.span: Specifies a base type used to define the contract for the registration and resolution of a peer mesh ID to the endpoint addresses of nodes participating in the mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是自訂對等名稱解析程式 (Resolver) 之實作 (Implementation) 的基底類別。This class is the base class for the implementation of custom peer name resolvers. 對等名稱解析程式是對等通道用來尋找參與對等網狀結構之對等節點的探索 (Discovery) 服務。A peer name resolver is a discovery service used by peer channels to find peer nodes participating in a peer mesh. 您也可以使用這個解析程式將節點「註冊」到對等網狀結構，透過這樣的機制使得對等節點成為已知的，並且可從對等網狀結構中取得。It is also used to "register" a node with a peer mesh, the mechanism by which the peer node becomes known and available from the peer mesh.

span.span: If true, the peer name resolver can share referrals; if false, it cannot.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只是初始化現有的對等解析程式執行個體，並不會建立新的執行個體。This method simply initializes the existing peer resolver instance; it does not create a new one. 若要建立新的對等解析程式，請在對應的繫結項目 (例如，) 上呼叫 CreatePeerResolver 方法。To create a new peer resolver, call the CreatePeerResolver method on the corresponding binding element (for example, ).

param.name: meshId

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Unregister (object registrationId, TimeSpan timeout);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unregister(object registrationId, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Unregister (registrationId As Object, timeout As TimeSpan)
public: abstract void Unregister(System::Object ^ registrationId, TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: registrationId
param.span: 透過前一次呼叫 所取得的節點註冊識別碼。

span.span: A registration ID for the node obtained by a previous call to .

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待從對等網狀結構成功移除註冊的時間長度。

span.span: The length of time to wait for a successful removal of the registration from the peer mesh.

param.span: 如果嘗試失敗，會在對等節點上引發 。

span.span: If the attempt fails, is raised on the peer.

summary.span: 從對等網狀結構移除節點的註冊項目。

span.span: Removes the registration entry for a node from a peer mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊識別碼是對等解析程式權杖，它最起碼可以表示對等節點識別碼與網狀結構識別碼的集合。A registration ID is a peer resolver token, that, at the very minimum, represents the tuple of a peer node ID and the mesh ID. 這個識別碼值必須是在前一次呼叫 時所取得的。This ID value must have been obtained in a previous call to . 會在兩種特定情況下被呼叫： is called in two specific cases: - 當 即將離開對等網狀結構時 (通常是因為關閉與它有關聯的最後一個對等通道或服務主機而發生)。When the is leaving the peer mesh (usually as the result of closing the last peer channel or service host that is associated with it). - 當 找不到其他參與對等網狀結構之節點的可用端點位址時。When the can find no available endpoint addresses of other nodes participating in the peer mesh. 因此， 就不再是可取得的，從而會嘗試呼叫 ，將本身從 中取消註冊。As a result, the is no longer reachable, and it will attempt to call to unregister itself from the . 如果網狀結構中的其他對等節點在取消註冊之後成為可用的，該節點可以呼叫 並取得新的註冊識別碼，將其本身重新註冊。If other peer nodes within the mesh become available subsequent to unregistration, the node can re-register itself by calling and obtaining a new registration ID.
